headline:
You woke in a small room with one light bulb on, the atmosphere is freaking you out
there's 2 door in front of you, choose what to do.

options-action.headline: You opened the second door, there's nothing but a dark valley in front of you.
You can't see anything but darkness, there's still a chance to go back, or you can just gamble and go straight in to the darkness.
You encountered a beast-like creature, staring at you with an eye widely opened.
options-input: Walk calmly, as slow as possible

options-action.headline: You ran, even if the creature didn't do anything, you are lost forever in the darkness, with no stamina left, starving to death.
You walk slowly pass the creature, to then tripped and fall off, and you woke up from your dream.
You stare the creature back, until you fall off, waking up from your dream.
You gain your way back, but cannot seem to progress, you are mostly lost out your way, lost in the darkness forever.
The room you woke up in had nowhere to be found, and you are mostly lost forever.
